description: A seasoned software developer with a knack for crafting innovative solutions. I'm currently pursuing a Masters in Computer Science from UMass Amherst, to further enhance my expertise in the ever-evolving realm of technology. With a passion for problem-solving and a keen eye for detail, I'm eager to transition into a full-time software engineer role from May 2024. My academic background has equipped me with a solid foundation in programming languages, algorithms, and data structures, while my practical experience has honed my ability to design, develop, and test complex software systems. I thrive in collaborative environments and am always eager to learn new technologies.

title: Why hire me?
description: Imagine having a software engineer who possesses not only technical expertise but also a creative flair, a collaborative spirit, and an unwavering dedication to excellence. That's precisely what you'll gain by hiring me. I bring to the table a diverse skillset, encompassing proficiency in programming languages like Python, Java, JavaScript, and C++, experience in designing and developing software applications, and a solid understanding of software development methodologies.

But my qualifications extend beyond technical prowess. I'm a team player, always eager to share knowledge and collaborate with fellow developers to achieve common goals. My problem-solving skills are sharp, enabling me to tackle complex challenges with a methodical and innovative approach. And most importantly, I'm driven by a genuine passion for software development, constantly seeking opportunities to expand my knowledge and refine my skills.

title: Hobbies
description: When I'm not immersed in the world of code, you'll find me cheering on my favorite football team (Go Bills! üèà), immersing myself in the melodies of music üéß, or getting lost in the captivating storylines of TV shows üìΩÔ∏è. Football ignites my competitive spirit and strategic thinking, while music provides a soothing escape and a creative outlet. And TV shows are my passport to diverse worlds, broadening my perspectives and sparking my imagination by letting me step into the shoes of captivating characters. These diverse hobbies not only provide a much-needed respite from the rigors of software development but also enrich my perspective and enhance my ability to connect with people from all walks of life.
